paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Among the 6 ATTRv patients, the TTR gene mutations were Val122Ile in 3 patients, Ser77Phe in 1, Ser77Tyr in 1, and Glu89Lys in 1.

functional_data.summary: The TTR gene mutations are associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis, leading to misfolding and aggregation of the TTR protein.

variants.segregation_data: The variants segregate with disease in families, as they are associated with hereditary conditions.
variants.additional_notes: The study indicates that all 6 patients with ATTRv had heart-liver transplants.
key_quotes: Among the 6 ATTRv patients, the TTR gene mutations were Val122Ile in 3 patients, Ser77Phe in 1, Ser77Tyr in 1, and Glu89Lys in 1.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the TTR gene variants were extracted successfully.
